name: Bloom (itch) (NikitaChernin, Jacob Hallberg)
description:
A simple 2d puzzle platformer all about spring! It has 5 levels, all varying in difficulty. 

To play, simply select your platform and download the zip file that applies. Extract it and play! 

BEWARE! There are some bugs in this game... it was made in only 45 hours by one person. The bugs are as follows:

 Something the player character's animation glitches out. To fix this just move in the opposite direction.

On Level 4, the ai Eagle sometimes pushes you into a collider. To fix this just restart the level. AI is complicated to code and this was just unaccounted for in the code for it. 

Like mentioned before, AI is hard to code so the mosquito on Level 5 might push you into a collider as well (It's not too common). Same as before... just restart the level.

Lastly, the transition from Level 4 to Level 5 is messed up. While it works in Unity, it does not when exporting the game. This seems to be a bug in Unity, but I might just be dumb. Just exit the game and use the level selection to select Level 5. 

While bugs mess up the game and ruin the fun, remember that I only had 40 hours, and was completed by just one person. I hate to leave it like this with bugs unfixed, but if you want to see more, drop some ideas in the comments below. 

This project contains lots of complicated shaders and complicated AI scripts, please be advised that it is a big folder and takes up quite a bit of space. I wanted to have it run in WebGL, but the project was too complicated to render correctly. 

This project was created for Spring 2D Jam 2021
